entry.title: You are precious to me.
entry.summary:
Author: Nyx_dreamy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 129,918Chapters: 46/?Kudos: 269

Summary: Damian had been sexually assaulted and after that his father saw the video, he just want to run away. That is how he end up living with Dick. Dick is conflicated about his feelings for Jason. Damian is now under his care and him and Bruce are still awkward around each other. And something is up with Tim but he doesn't know what. Jason is waiting for Dick to give him a proper answer. His hate for Bruce is too strong and he do not feel welcome in their perfect little family. or Everyone is dealing with things and their family is slowly falling appart. Would they succeed to all get along and get over the mistakes of the past?

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 191,897Chapters: 41/53Kudos: 1,477

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: temporal parts
entry.summary:
Author: escyn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,368Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: [Jason lets himself drink in the sight of Dick underneath him. He is beautiful like this—flushed, shaking—chest coated in a deep blue kevlar he had never seen before two weeks ago. Jason takes it in now. Reinforced at the shoulders, right where the cowl would connect. Fingerstripes are still there—but the blue bleeds into a bat splashed along his heaving pecs. Undeniably Batman. In Blue. Not unlike the red Bat etches into Jason’s own chest. Two men grown in different worlds, shaped by different griefs, different ghosts—or maybe they are the same—and somehow both left hollow. Aching. Needing. By the same title—the same burden—] or, Jason Todd has been Batman for a very long time—has been alone for just as long. Maybe this Dick Grayson can fix that.

entry.title: Protecting What You Don't Deserve
entry.summary:
Author: Kichi (sentanixiv)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,164Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 82

Summary: Dick Grayson loves too freely and deeply for his own good. Wary of the heartbreak that inevitably follows, there's a guardian 'angel' that visits each new partner with a simple warning: Hurt Dick Grayson and they'll be back for you. With a shovel and a grave freshly marked.ORThe five times that Jason Todd gives the shovel talk to Dick's romantic partners, and the one time he has to give it to himself.-“Right,” she replied, disbelieving. When he made no move towards or away from her, she risked a quick glance at the shovel, an eyebrow arching up. She understood the implication there and seemed more annoyed than scared. “Really? Are we doing this again?”He’d expected that. Jason chuckled at her taunt, pushing off the wall. He pulled the cigarette from between his lips, breathing out a halo of smoke. “You got a free pass last time,” he said with a shrug. Truth, for it’d been Tarantula’s machinations that tipped Babara’s relationship with Dick over into heartbreak, saving her full blame and, as such, a grave. “You can thank Catalina Flores for that.”

entry.title: To Have and To Hold
entry.summary:
Author: Starless_Void

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,258Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 49

Summary: Jason makes his way back to Gotham about a year after his big fight with Bruce. He hunkers down in a new apartment, staying as far under the radar as possible to avoid any contact with the Bats- who would probably throw him in Arkham the first chance they got. If only that were his only problem. On top of staying out of the attention of the most paranoid people on the planet, Jason is trying to find a way to undo a stupid spell that has left him in a rather strange state. Returning to Gotham is probably up there in the stupidest decisions he's ever made, but it's his home too. As long as he lays low, doesn't rebuild his criminal empire, and keeps to himself, there shouldn't be any reason for the Bats to bother him.   Dick Grayson has lost Jason twice now. There won't be a third.

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 163,877Chapters: 39/56Kudos: 271

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: Dick bites. It's a problem.
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,887Chapters: 19/28Kudos: 347

Summary: Thanks to batsandbirdbrains (Tumblr) it's now my headcanon that Dick bit as Robin.This is a COLLECTION of oneshots, somewhat related around one thing: Dick bites.Mostly Mature for the biting and violence, though the last chapter is PWP (DickJay). “You bite strange men, you get the rinse,” Batman said. “That’s the rule.” Robin tried to twist away, but Batman levered Robin up onto his feet with one hand, the other aiming the peroxide at Robin’s mouth. Robin clamped his lips tight. Batman’s patience snapped. “Open,” he growled. “Now.”“Mh-mh!” Robin kicked, but Batman hoisted him higher, one hand under Robin’s armpit, the other holding his head in place.“You don’t want hepatitis.” Batman said, voice ticking up a notch.Robin stopped struggling, eyes wide. Batman saw the pause, and loosened his grip - only to make Robin wind out of his grip and start running. The man with the bitten arm moaned.“What the fuck is wrong with you?” he managed, voice thick with pain and shock.Robin deadlooped over him, baring his teeth in a wicked, blood-stained grin.“Don’t grab the Robin,” he said. “That’s the first lesson.” Fully written fic, upload every Wednesday and Sunday!

entry.title: First Time on the Second Time Around
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,419Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 100

Summary: Jason had missed out on so much, and sometimes when Dick looked at him that was all he could think about. Every lost little milestone of late adolescence that all had been taken from him. Other times, though, catching Jason stripping off his helmet and shirt heading in for a shower down in the cave post-patrol for example, Dick's thoughts would drift in a different direction. He wondered if maybe there were still certain things Jason had yet to lose. It wasn't an unreasonable question for Dick to ask, just last week he'd let Jason suck a hickey into his neck after he'd crawled into Dick's bed complaining that he couldn't sleep. It hadn't been the first time either, but they'd never gone any further than making out even though Dick had tried to make it clear he'd be more than okay with doing more. All of that to say, there was a non-zero possibility that Jason was still a virgin. For Batship Winter/Dick Week Prompt: Virginity Kink
